title: Law & Order : Miniopolis Squad
content:
Since December 2004, i've been working on a series called 'Law & Order : Miniopolis Squad' which is an unlikely combination of the US drama, 'Law & Order' and the handheld versions of 'The Urbz : Sims In The City' video game.

The series has ended in June with only 5 episodes. Click [url=http://www.sims99.com/directors.php?view=sillygostly]here[/url] to check them out among other movies.

The series ended as it takes forever to obtain lines from actors, and also due to the same reasons as Ilsoap for cancelling 'Shadowlands'.

Enjoy! And leave a review if possible. Or you can tell me what you think here. [img]http://www.classicgaming.com/cc314/msgboard/emotikeen-smile.gif[/img]

Oh, and all episodes are between 13MB-18MB in size and are WMV files.[img]http://www.geocities.com/miniopolis/soul.txt[/img]
